code: import moment from'moment';import i18next from'i18next';export var getDWEDChatDetailTime=function getDWEDChatDetailTime(date){var last=moment(date);var now=moment(new Date());var duration=moment.duration(now.diff(last));if(duration.asHours()<1){return last.fromNow();}else if(duration.asHours()>1&&duration.asDays()<2){return last.calendar().toLowerCase();}else if(duration.asDays()>2&&duration.asDays()<8){var weekDay=moment.weekdays()[last.isoWeekday()];return"".concat(weekDay,", ").concat(last.format('HH:mm'));}else if(duration.asDays()>7){return last.format('DD.MM.YYYY');}};export var getDWEDCHatListTime=function getDWEDCHatListTime(date){var last=moment(date);var now=moment(new Date());var duration=moment.duration(now.diff(last));return last.calendar(null,{sameDay:'HH:mm',lastDay:'dd',lastWeek:'dd',sameElse:duration.asYears()>1?'DD.MM.YY':'DD.MM'});};export var getDWEDGroupOfChatTime=function getDWEDGroupOfChatTime(date){var last=moment(date);var now=moment(new Date());var duration=moment.duration(now.diff(last));if(duration.asDays()<1){return i18next.t('today');}else{return last.format('D MMMM');}};export var getWeekDay=function getWeekDay(date){return new Date(date).toLocaleString('en-US',{weekday:'short'}).toLowerCase();};export var getDateTime=function getDateTime(number){var now=new Date().toDateString();var time=String(number.toFixed(2)).split('.').join(':');return new Date("".concat(now," ").concat(time));};
